snippet: “Delhi Safari” shamelessly rips off much better animated movies, critic says.
abstract: “Delhi Safari” shamelessly rips off much better animated movies, critic says.
lead_paragraph: “The worst thing about the animated film “Delhi Safari” isn’t that it’s awful,” Neil Genzlinger wrote in The New York Times, but that “it shamelessly rips off much better animated movies.”

headline.main: Movie Review: ‘Delhi Safari,’ Directed by Nikhil Advani
